LanguageData.MutagenicFallout.label: mutagenic fallout
LanguageData.MutagenicFallout.description: A plume of mutagenic mechanites from some distant source is slowly settling over this entire region. Any living thing not under a roof will be slowly mutated, and may eventually become animals.
LanguageData.MutagenicFallout.endMessage: The worst of the toxic fallout has settled.
